04102.mean:
1. the fourteenth consonant letter of the Sirijunga alphabet. 2/. a prefix often preceding an adjectival word denoting excessiveness.

१. सिरिजङ्गा वर्णमालाको चौधौँ व्यन्जनवर्ण । २. मात्रात्मक वा गुणात्मक आधिक्य बुझाउन प्रायः विशेषण पदको अगाडि जोडिएर आउने उपसर्ग ।

04106.mean:
a vulgar or obscene word uttered spontaneously by one going to fall.

झन्डै लड्न लाग्दा अनायास मुख बाट निस्कने अश्लील शब्दविशेष ।

04107.mean:
1. (of bone, earth etc) to crack. 2. to cleave lmeanthwise.

१. चर्कनु (हाड, भूइँ आदि) । २. धाँजा पर्नु; चिरा पर्नु ।

04108.mean:
1. (manner of lifting or uprooting) smartly/ jauntily/ with a jerk. 2. holding or clasping smartly/ tightly. 3. bristling or standing of the hairs of the head.

१. जुरूक्क, जडैदेखि उखेलिने गरी । २. च्याप्प; ठ्याप्प । ३. जिङ्रिङ्ग ।

04109.mean:
the root of chayote. Sechium edule.

इस्कुसको जरा ।

04111.mean:
a small basket made of split bamboo; a basket of split bamboo used as a measuring unit equivalent to a Pathi.

चोयाको सानो डालो (थुन्से आकारको); पाथी ।

04112.mean:
falling with a sound like that of spitting or that of gently striking; falling down with a thunder/ dashing sound.

फ्याट्ट, प्यात्त, प्याच्च, प्वाक्क वा ड्वाङ्ग खस्ने किसिमले ।

04113.mean:
a cry/shout of delight/joy; a word to express joy; delight cheer.

खुशीको स्वर; खुशियाली व्यक्त गर्ने ध्वनि; खुशीको भाव प्रकट गर्ने शब्दविशेष; कुर्रै ।

04116.mean:
1. china-berry. Melia azedarach; Azedarachta indica. 2. a kind of fly which is found in cow-dung and human shits.

१. बकाइनु । २. गुहे झिँगा ।

04119.mean:
a deity (or spirit) residing on the cross roads.

दोबाटे देवता (वा जीवात्मा) ।

04120.mean:
a low growing plant with nodules at its roots. Nephrolepis cordifolia.

पानी अमला ।

04124.mean:
to leave sth/sb behind; to overtake sb or sth.

उछिन्नु (छाडेर जानु) ।

04125.mean:
a kind of grass called Ilame.

इलामे झार ।

04126.mean:
with healthy rosy cheeks; rose-checked.

भुक्क गाला उठेको; रातो गाला भएको ।

04127.mean:
1. fleshy (filled with grains); (of body) healthy. 2. obese; very fat (with bulging/ protruding stomach).

१. पोटिलो । २. एकदमै मोटो (भुँडी भुक्क उठेको); लम्बोदर ।

04130.mean:
a particular kind of reed ( used to make furniture). Arundineria artistata.

निगालो ।

04133.mean:
stone ball used for shot put.

छेलो हान्ने ढुङ्गो ।

04134.mean:
1. tuber; edible roots (yam, potatoes etc). 2. well; lake; pond. 3. a basket with feet.

१. फल; कन्दमुल (तरुल आलु आदि) । २. कुवा; पोखरी । ३. डालो ।

04136.mean:
cattle-fly.

डाँठ झिँगा; बस्तुभाउको जीउमा टाँसिने एक प्रकारको झिँगा; कुकुर झिँगा ।

04143.mean:
1. the things which are produced (eg: crops). 2. production. 3. food grains.

१. उब्जाएको, फलाएको वस्तु (धान, अन्न आदि) । २. उत्पादन । ३. खाद्यान्न ।

04147.mean:
a pot or wooden vessel for keeping liquor, millet beer etc.

चौंठो; जाँड रक्सी राख्ने माटो वा काठको भाँडो ।

04151.mean:
(of man) lazy; slow; dull.

ढिलो; सुस्त; बोधो ।

04153.mean:
1. (of market) be broken up; to come to an end. 2. to blow/carry off; to carry/wash away. 3. to lift up with one’s hand; to raise to carry in one’s hand.

१. हाट, बजार, सभा आदि सकिनु । २. पानी वा हावा आदिले बोक्नु; उडाएर बगाएर लजानु । ३. उचाल्नु; बोक्नु (हातले) ।

04155.mean:
in a manner of rising lazily and slowly.

आलस्यपूर्ण ढाँचाले; बिस्तारै उठ्ने चालाले ।

04156.mean:
1. financial help. 2. financial help given during a wedding.

१. आर्थिक सहयोग; पैसाको मद्दत । २. लिम्बू जातिमा बिहेमा अरूले दिने नगद सहयोग; त्यस्तो सहयोगको नगद ।

04157.mean:
rice bean; red bean. Phaseolus calcaratus.

मस्याम्; वनमारा दाल ।

04163.mean:
1. to cradle; to baby-sit (also baby-sit). 2. to make sb play; to ask to play; to put to games.

१. खेलाउनु (शिशुलाई) । २. खेल्न लगाउनु ।

04164.mean:
1. a kind of bird. 2. extremely large or very loose; fluttering; oversized.

१. गोलसिमल चरो । २. ह्वार्लाङ् ह्वाङ्लाङ् ।

04165.mean:
1. a Limbu custom of asking the guests to leave their seats (during marriage or purification ceremony). 2. a kind of Chyabrung dance danced while requesting the guest to leave their seats during a marriage ceremony.

१. उठौनी; (विवाह, भोज वा जूठो बाट चोख्याउने कार्यमा आउने आगन्तुक अतिथिहरूलाई) आसनबाट उठाउन गरिने रीत । २. विवाह कार्यमा आउने अथितिहरूलाई आसनबाट उठाउँदा नाचिने च्याब्रुङ् नाचको विशेष प्रकार ।

04166.mean:
1. to carry each other. 2. to help/ support each other; to lend mutual support; to co-operate mutually.

१. एकले अर्कोलाई बोक्नु/ उचाल्नु । २. परस्पर सहयोग गर्नु ।

04167.mean:
stomach trouble caused by an evil look while eating.

चोखे; खाँदा अरू कसैको नराम्रो आँखा लागेर पेट दुख्ने बिमारी ।

04168.mean:
a manner of sitting or clustering in small groups.

झुरूप्प/ झुरूम्म बस्ने काइदाले ।

04170.mean:
in a manner of drying up/stiffening/freezing hard.

कक्रक्क (सुकेर)/ स्वाट्टै ।

04178.mean:
a rough stony track/path.

राम्ररी नबनेको ढुङ्गैढुङ्गा भएको बाटो ।

04184.mean:
(coming) unexpectedly; accidentally; instantly; quickly.

फुत्त, झ्वास्स वा झ्वाट्ट आउन् किसिमले ।

04185.mean:
lazily.

अल्सी पाराले; चाक गह्रौ पारेर बस्ने काइदाले ।

04186.mean:
1. lazy. 2. a person without manner.

१. अल्सी । २. ग्वाँगे; विनाढङ्गको मान्छे; ढङ्गरङ्ग नभएको मान्छे ।

04187.mean:
(fem.) 1. lazy. 2. a person without manner.

(स्त्री) १. अल्सी । २. ढङ्ग नभएकी ।

04189.mean:
sluggish; lazy; slack; slothful; sluggard.

लोसे; लोते; ढिलो; सुस्त; ढिलोखालको ।

04190.mean:
(fem.) sluggish; lazy; slack; slothful; sluggard.

(स्त्री) लोसी; लोते; ढिलो; सुस्त; ढिलोखालकी ।

04191.mean:
lazy; slack; slothful; sluggish; indolent.

लोसे; ढिलो-ढिलो; सुस्त ।

04192.mean:
a kind of large tree-climbing lizard; a species of crocodile; iguana.

गोहोरो ।

04194.mean:
(of fruits) in a manner of overripening.

साह्रै वा फ्यात्त पाक्ने किसिमले ।

04197.mean:
1. distinct; transparent. 2. specific; particular.

१. स्पष्ट; पारदर्शी । २. विशेष ।

04199.mean:
1. hornet. 2. iguana, a large tree-climbing lizard.

१. अरिङ्गाल । २. गोहोरो ।

04200.mean:
shutter of a window; window-pans.

झ्यालको पल्ला; झ्यालको खापा ।

04202.mean:
excellent; best; very pretty; very beautiful; exquisite.

अति राम्रो/ राम्री ।

04205.mean:
1. conducive to happiness; pleasant. 2. benevolent.

१. सुखदायी । २. कल्याणकारी ।

04208.mean:
oldest Limbu ornament; amber; coral beads.

प्वाँलो; मणिमाला; तृणमणि ।

04212.mean:
a loaf; a flat bread.

पाउरोटी; च्यप्टो रोटी ।

04213.mean:
1. (fruit) to grow. 2. to be meanaged in/to take to work; to be busy. 3. (adhesive) to be (eg- wound). 4. to be suspended; to be in a hanging position (eg- moon). 5. to continue; to be incessant; to go on non-stop (eg- keep raining, burning); to rain/ burn incessantly. 6. a verb used to show continuity of work/ continuous tense.

१. फल लाग्नु । २. काममा लाग्नु । ३. (टाँसिएर रहेको) हुनु; रहेको जस्तो हुनु (जस्तै- घाउ) । ४ (टाँगिएर, झुन्डिएर रहेको) हुनु (जस्तै- जुन) । ५. कुनै घटना वा काममा लगातार भइरहनु (जस्तै- पानी परिरहनु वा आगो बलिरहनु ) । ६. कुनै अर्को कृयापदसंग आई काम भइरहेको तर नटुङ्गिएको अर्थ बुझाउने सहायक कृयापद ।

04216.mean:
1. to make a bundle; to mat one’s hair; to ball up/hump one’s hair into a bun. 2. to fence/enclose/surround (the plants).

१. पोको पार्नु; कपाल आदि गुजुल्टो पार्नु । २. बिरुवा बार्नु; बिरुवालाई बारबेर गर्नु ।

04218.mean:
to hang in bunches like grapes.

झुप्पाझुप्पा झुन्डेको हुनु ।

04222.mean:
shuddering, trembling due to fear; feeling a fearful sensation while reaching the top of tree or sth edge of a high rock.

डरले चिउँचिउँ हुने किसिमले ।

04223.mean:
enough; sufficient; as much as desired; ot one’s heart’s content.

यथेष्ट ।

04224.mean:
1. in bunches growing/bearing fruits etc; clusters. 2. easily; wholly; jerkily; jauntily.

१. लटरम्म; लटरम्म फल्ने गरी । २. घ्वाच्चै; ल्वात्तै; हुत्तै ।

04228.mean:
sitting on the ground with crossed or folded legs.

पलेँटी; सुखासन; खुट्टा दोब्र्याएर बसिने आसन ।

04229.mean:
life; vitality; being at the point/on the verge of death due to wearieness; tireness, exhaustion.

प्राण; ज्यान; प्राण जालाजस्तो थाकेर लखतरान भएको ।

04231.mean:
a particular kind of millet. Panicum cruss-galli.

जुनेलो ।

04235.mean:
in a manner of falling down by slipping.

सुलुत्त चिप्लेर लड्ने, झर्ने वा खस्ने चालाले ।

04238.mean:
a kind of small earthen pot (jar).

माटोको सानो खालको भाँडो ।

04242.mean:
door at the entrance/ threshold.

दैलोको खापा; पल्ला ।

04243.mean:
slamming/ banging door etc.

ढ्याम्म वा ढ्याप्प थुन्ने किसिमले ।

04246.mean:
being very fatty; in the manner of itching badly.

१. साह्रै बोस्याइलो । २. चिल्चिलाउने किसिमले ।

04248.mean:
being dejected/ disappointed/ disheartened.

विरक्त, निराश, हताश हुने चालाले ।

04250.mean:
to crack open; to crack and brust.

चर्कनु; चर्केर फुट्नु ।

04254.mean:
1. to throw stones etc at sb. 2. to add more. 3. to make ridge or terrace (eg: of a rice field).

१. ढुङ्गा-मुढा गर्नु; केहि चिजले हान्नु । २. थप्नु । ३. आली लाउनु ।

04257.mean:
1. migratory. 2. landless.

१. डुलुवा; बसाइँ सरी हिड्ने । २. सुकुमवासी ।
